name: Soccer net
description: A net used in the game of soccer to catch the ball when it is kicked into the goal.

name: Volleyball net
description: A net used in the game of volleyball to separate the two teams and catch the ball when it is hit over the net.

name: Tennis net
description: A net used in the game of tennis to separate the two players and catch the ball when it is hit over the net.

name: Badminton net
description: A net used in the game of badminton to separate the two players and catch the shuttlecock when it is hit over the net.
